00036     class GLESHardwarePixelBuffer;

00040     struct _OgreGLESExport GLESSurfaceDesc
00041     {
00042         public:
00043             GLESHardwarePixelBuffer *buffer;
00044             size_t zoffset;
00045             uint numSamples;
00046 
00047             GLESSurfaceDesc() :buffer(0), zoffset(0), numSamples(0) {}
00048     };

00052     class _OgreGLESExport GLESRenderTexture : public RenderTexture
00053     {
00054         public:
00055             GLESRenderTexture(const String &name, const GLESSurfaceDesc &target, bool writeGamma, uint fsaa);
00056             virtual ~GLESRenderTexture();
00057             bool requiresTextureFlipping() const { return true; }
00058     };
00059 
00062     class _OgreGLESExport GLESRTTManager : public Singleton<GLESRTTManager>
00063     {
00064         public:
00065             virtual ~GLESRTTManager();
00066 
00069             virtual RenderTexture *createRenderTexture(const String &name, const GLESSurfaceDesc &target, bool writeGamma, uint fsaa) = 0;
00070 
00073             virtual bool checkFormat(PixelFormat format) = 0;
00074 
00077             virtual void bind(RenderTarget *target) = 0;
00078 
00083             virtual void unbind(RenderTarget *target) = 0;
00084 
00085             virtual void getBestDepthStencil(GLenum internalFormat, GLenum *depthFormat, GLenum *stencilFormat)
00086             {
00087                 *depthFormat = GL_NONE;
00088                 *stencilFormat = GL_NONE;
00089             }
00090 
00093             virtual MultiRenderTarget* createMultiRenderTarget(const String & name);
00094 
00097             virtual PixelFormat getSupportedAlternative(PixelFormat format);
00098     };
